turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Hi, I'm calling about a charge on my latest bill. It's for $75, and I don't recognize it at all. My account number is 1234567890.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Thank you for calling. Please give me a moment while I pull up your account. Okay, I see the $75 charge. Can you confirm the billing date for me, please?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: It's dated October 26th. Honestly, this is the third time I've had to call about incorrect charges. It's getting really frustrating!

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: I understand your frustration. I apologize for the inconvenience. It appears this charge is for a premium channel subscription that was added on October 19th. Do you recall adding that subscription? Or, is it possible someone else with access to your account might have?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: No, I definitely did not add that! And no one else uses my account. If you're adding premium channels without authorization, how can I be sure this won't happen again? And will I get a refund?
